nhc_headline: ...SARA NEARING LANDFALL ALONG THE BELIZE COAST WITH HEAVY RAINS  MOVING INLAND OVER PORTIONS OF THE YUCATAN PENINSULA...
summary:
...SARA NEARING LANDFALL ALONG THE BELIZE COAST WITH HEAVY RAINS  MOVING INLAND OVER PORTIONS OF THE YUCATAN PENINSULA...
 As of 6:00 AM CST Sun Nov 17
 the center of Sara was located near 16.7, -87.9
 with movement WNW at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
